name: Jin Jang
description:
Lead the Jin Jang pieces through the puzzle and connect them again!

Use arrows to move. Jin moves with the arrows, Jang moves at the same time, just in the opposite direction. Note, that if for example Jin doesn't have obstacle on the right, and you try to move right, but Jang has obstacle on the left, then none of the pieces will move when you hit the right arrow. 

This game was created during Global Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours. 
Theme of the Game Jam: Duality.
